translations.sample.title: I18n Sample Page
translations.sample.basic.content: This is a simple paragraph that needs translation.
translations.1297957034488360790: This paragraph has no custom ID, just the i18n attribute.
translations.2002272803511843863: {VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {just now} =1 {one minute ago} other {{INTERPOLATION} minutes ago}}
